_sText:
Zm_zuluville_facility_acp_v1 is a small map that I have created.
My main goal is quite simpile with this map, this is campers must die!
Its not called camping mod after all.

There are a few heavy camping spots but they have a few functions in which zombies can use in order to kill the campers.
Some traps are just buttons on a timer and others you need to know a code to open doors etc.
I also tryed to get rid of most of the corners as a lot of the time zombies can get trapped in this, what I did instead was add 90 degrees arches and what happends is the zombies deflect and end up getting boosted else where, worked well in testing.

The map I know has not a great amount of detail but I wanted all the walls and floor to be smooth and empty so they when the zombies get boosted there is little to get stuck on.

I hope it can be a fun and at times funny map with good balance.
